google_reviews.author: Davey Fromthenavy
google_reviews.review: Update: Fleas on the 3rd floor as of April - one of the units has a warning on their door. Management did not give any notice to tenants that there were fleas in the building.

google_reviews.author: Jamie M
google_reviews.review:
Zero Stars.

Management is non existent, heat is inadequate, door locks on building do not

google_reviews.author: Jordan Grant
google_reviews.review: Lived here for a little over 2 months so far and no issues! Quiet and good location with trails. Will update if anything changes.

google_reviews.author: Helen kh
google_reviews.review: management is a ghost. submitted a maintenance request got cancelled and was told to do it myself with no direction or special tools that require to fix outlets and kitchen lights. The front door hasnt been working for days and one of the

google_reviews.author: Tracey Stich
google_reviews.review: Tried to apply for an apartment and management was nonexistent, it took 3 weeks to get a reply. Tried calling the office several times and the phone just rings. After reading all the other bad reviews, I don't think it will be worth it to

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback, Tracey. From our records, we show that a member of our team has been in contact with you, but we will be happy to reach out again to make sure we address your concerns!

google_reviews.author: Trevor M
google_reviews.review: Spend your money elsewhere... We moved into this brand new building that had and still has more issues than they know what to do with. If you can even get a hold of someone in their office they'll just play dumb and act sorry. Maintenance

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback, as it helps us make improvements for the community. We are sorry you have not been satisfied with your experience so far at Crescent, and we take your concerns seriously. Our maintenance team should have been in  More

google_reviews.author: Kyle E
google_reviews.review: Have had a great experience here.  Apartments are new and in good condition.  Good walking trails and dog areas.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for your feedback! We're so glad to hear you enjoy the community. Let us know if there is ever anything we can do to improve your experience.
Allayna, thank you for your review. We are sorry to see that you have not been pleased with your experience, and a member of our team has reached out to you directly to see what we can do to help.
